mapper.select: SELECT ID, EMAIL, PASSWORD, NICKNAME, TYPE, GENDER, AGE FROM USER
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER( EMAIL, PASSWORD, NICKNAME, TYPE, GENDER, AGE) VALUES(#{email}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{type}, #{gender}, #{age})
mapper.update: UPDATE USER SET EMAIL = #{email}, PASSWORD = #{password}, NICKNAME = #{nickname}, TYPE = #{type}, GENDER = #{gender}, AGE = #{age} WHERE EMAIL = #{email}
